Token.Abstract: A delegate class exposing mothods to provide cells and supplementary views matching the source data.
Returns the number of items conatined in specific section.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance requesting the information.

Token.Abstract: Returns a TKListViewCell instance for a given index path. The cell that is returned must be retrieved from a call to -dequeueReusableCellWithReuseIdentifier:forIndexPath:

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance requesting the cell.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path we need a cell for.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance requesting the cell.

Token.Abstract: Returns a view to be used as a section header or footer in TKListView. The cell that is returned must be retrieved from a call to -dequeueReusableSupplementaryViewOfKind:withReuseIdentifier:forIndexPath:

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance requesting the cell.

Parameter.Name: kind
Parameter.Abstract: The kind of the supplementary view e.g. TKListViewElementKindSectionHeader or TKListViewElementKindSectionFooter

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path we need a cell for.
